product_name: White Sierra Trabagon Plaid Rain Jacket - Women's - Special Buy
long_description: The White Sierra Trabagon Plaid rain jacket offers waterproof and wind-resistant protection in a pretty plaid. Stash it in your pack while running errands, traveling or hiking. Ripstop polyester has a waterproof, breathable coating and all seams are sealed for complete protection. Teflon(R) face-finish sheds water and stains. Back yoke mesh vent allows air to circulate. Hood stows away in collar. Drawcord hem and adjustable cuffs perfect the fit. Zip hand pockets. White Sierra Trabagon jacket conveniently packs up in front pocket. Special buy.
short_description: The White Sierra Trabagon Plaid rain jacket offers waterproof and wind-resistant protection in a pretty plaid. Stash it in your pack while running errands, traveling or hiking.
